Text.Page:
Those damned {@LinkCreature:23#21#trickster jesters} and {@LinkCreature:23#22#kobold bloodletters} are encroaching on our position.

If I send anyone else, they'll be going to their deaths. This calls for a veteran like you.

Do unto them before they do unto us.

Kobolds are basically cowards.

A defeat like the one you just gave them should keep them at bay for quite awhile.
